DOC.brief_summary: All patients over 18 who undergo a revision of hip or knee arthroplasty will be included. Patients undergo a CT of the hip joint. A radiologist will mark the presence of cysts and bone loss and will assess implant stability. After the surgery, the surgeon will fill a similar form.
DOC.brief_title: CT for Diagnosis of Implant Stability in Revision Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: patients admitted for hip or knee revision arthroplasty age over 18 fractures dislocations
